mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK ( BOOK_NO, COUNT, DEP_CODE, ARR_CODE, PAY, PRICE, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, DAY, MEM_NO, WB_CHECK ) VALUES ( #{BOOK_NO}, #{COUNT}, #{DEP_CODE}, #{ARR_CODE}, #{PAY}, #{PRICE}, #{NAME}, #{EMAIL}, #{PHONE}, #{DAY}, #{MEM_NO}, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOOK ORDER BY DAY DESC
SELECT * FROM BOOK WHERE MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO} ORDER BY DAY DESC
SELECT * FROM BOOK WHERE MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO} AND WB_CHECK = 'N' ORDER BY DAY DESC
SELECT * FROM BOOK WHERE MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO} AND WB_CHECK = 'Y' ORDER BY DAY DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK SET COUNT = #{COUNT}, DEP_CODE = #{DEP_CODE}, ARR_CODE = #{ARR_CODE}, PAY = #{PAY}, PRICE = #{PRICE}, NAME = #{NAME}, EMAIL = #{EMAIL}, PHONE = #{PHONE}, DAY = #{DAY}, MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO} WHERE BOOK_NO = #{BOOK_NO}
